artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a woman on the left in a gray and white striped gown with a bouquet of pink flowers and green foliage at the neckline and a yellow and red hat with purple plumes and purple ribbon and bow; man in the center in black breeches, a gray and white striped coat, a sword at his side, and a black hat tucked under his arm; at the right is a purple and yellow woman's hat with yellow ruffles and white, purple, and yellow plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Sixième Cahier, 10 Janvier 1788
